articles.title: SCORPIO: Markus Jooste's 'lover' Berdine Odendaal lives off Steinhoff riches, Reserve Bank suspects - Daily Maverick
articles.description: The South African Reserve Bank suspects the ‘lavish lifestyle’ of polo-playing socialite Berdine Odendaal is funded by illicit Steinhoff money channelled to her on the ‘oral instructions’ of her alleged lover, Markus Jooste. What is significant, is that Joost…
articles.content: Berdine Odendaal was more than an alleged girlfriend to Markus Jooste, court documents suggest, and may well be funnelling illicit Steinhoff cash back into his pockets while simultaneously living han… [+14616 chars]

articles.title: Nigeria may get Lassa fever vaccine by 2030 -Researchers - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Scientists from West Africa have said Nigeria may get a Lassa fever vaccine by 2030.
articles.content:
Scientists from West Africa have said Nigeria may get a Lassa fever vaccine by 2030.

articles.content:

articles.title: WATCH | If you can’t speak Zulu, be prepared to starve: Seputla Sebogodi on SA's acting industry - TimesLIVE
articles.description: 'In South Africa, if you can’t speak Zulu, you are as good as scrambled eggs. It’s a big thing.'
